Package org.dudss.nodeshot.terrain

Terrain and corruption generation, updating and rendering classes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Chunk
    A square tile representation.
    Chunks
    Manages terrain and corruption generation, updating, optimising and rendering.
    Section
    Represents a rectangular grid of Chunks with a fixed size (Base.SECTION_SIZE).
    TerrainEdgeInfo
    Wrapper for some utility TerrainEdge data.
    TerrainEdgeResolver
    A static class that provides utility methods for terrain smoothing / edge recognition.
    TerrainEditor
    A helper class that manages some terrain operations.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Chunk.EdgeType
    Types of edges
    Chunks.OreType  
    Chunks.Visibility
    Fog of war visibility types

Package org.dudss.nodeshot.terrain Description

Terrain and corruption generation, updating and rendering classes.
